programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: Indias big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir.

programme.title: Desert Lions: Surviving At Skeleton Coast
Eternal Enemies: Lions And Hyenas (Revealed)
programme.desc: The Jouberts Emmy winning film is back with stunning remastered footage. Propelled by Jeremy Irons gripping narration, Eternal Enemies reveals the story of conflict between lions and hyenas, relatively unknown or even suspected in the scientific world before this. The intense relationship and enduring rivalry between the two species play out in a battle of survival. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Diary of A Teen Leopard
programme.desc: Pemba is a Mammas Boy! At two-years old, he should be independent, but hes still living at home! Like most teenagers, hes impatient and headstrong, which makes him bad at stalking and hunting, so Mom provides all their meals. But when Mom is injured Pemba is forced to grow up fast in order to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?

programme.title: Man v Lion
programme.desc: Fourth generation big cat tracker Boone Smith has worked in the harshest conditions imaginable, tracking the most elusive cats on the planet. But now he has a new mission that will bring us closer to the action than ever before. In Man v. Lion, only an inch of acrylic will separate Boone from one of the worlds top predators, bringing audiences closer to the African lion than they could ever imagine. The show follows Boone across the Nambiti Game Reserve as he breaks down each stage of a lions kill. Boone tracks a lion coalition as they hunt and search for a mate, ultimately putting him face-to-face with these apex predators.

programme.title: Attack of the Big Cats
programme.desc: There are nearly 40 different species of cats running around out there, but only four make it into the big cat club. The lion, tiger, leopard and jaguar. And theyre armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. Its not always all about size, you know.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Diary of A Teen Leopard
programme.desc: Pemba is a Mammas Boy! At two-years old, he should be independent, but hes still living at home! Like most teenagers, hes impatient and headstrong, which makes him bad at stalking and hunting, so Mom provides all their meals. But when Mom is injured Pemba is forced to grow up fast in order to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: The lines between hunter and hunted become blurred in this epic safari. Hold on to your seats as an elephant charges through the bush with a lion dangling from its tusks. Watch as male leopards engage in a turf war, and a pack of hyenas bully a lion off of his buffalo kill. The safari intensifies as a leopard, wild dogs and hyenas fight for the same kill in an astonishing display of raw nature.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories. A male crocodile must target large prey in a bid to survive the harshest time of the year.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track, stalk and ambush seals, whales and walruses. We follow a mother fighting to feed her two cubs in the harsh polar extremes, and a young male driven by starvation to tackle enormous prey.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the savannah turns into a battleground, its hard to choose a hero. Were on the edge of our safari seats as a leopard is cornered by a pride of lions, a young impala is hurled into the air by a hippo and two hyenas try to drown each other. Then, the rarest of sightings as an Aardvark runs for its life from a brown hyaena. Who will win when its tooth versus claw?

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Life in the African bush is a game of survival, for both hunter and hunted. Add babies to the mix and youll see astounding feats of courage as mothers risk life and limb to protect their young. In spring, tall grass helps babies hide out of sight, but it also camouflages predators on the prowl. This game drive captures extraordinary behaviour as families and individuals battle to eat, defend, and raise young.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: The lines between hunter and hunted become blurred in this epic safari. Hold on to your seats as an elephant charges through the bush with a lion dangling from its tusks. Watch as male leopards engage in a turf war, and a pack of hyenas bully a lion off of his buffalo kill. The safari intensifies as a leopard, wild dogs and hyenas fight for the same kill in an astonishing display of raw nature.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Its starting to look like winter in Michigan. The cold weather doesnt stop Dr. Brenda from responding to an afterhours farm call to treat a down cow. Dr. Pol helps a German Shepherd that is in pain after eating cooked bones. Dr. Lisa uses a portable ultrasound to pregnancy check a highland cow, and Dr. Nicole staples a wound hidden under an Aussiedoodles thick fur. During breaks in the cases, Dr. Lisa leaves the clinic to go cross country skiing, and the Pol family gathers to go sledding.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, bloodlines are considered to be incredibly important. Investigating to what extent animals genetic code can influence its survival in the merciless world of nature, the story takes a closer look at the lives of six predators, zooming in on the challenges and tribulations these extraordinary creatures face on a daily basis. Will their bloodlines continue or fall away as the stronger ones take their place?

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis apmetas mājā, ko viņam uzceļ Fransuā tētis.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis lasa Pepai un Džordžam vakara pasaku. Vēlāk Džordžs atkal pamostas, tāpēc Pepai jāizdomā cita pasaka.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad ģimene aizbrauc uz skaisto kalnu, tētis pazaudē mašīnas atslēgas dziļā notekā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad viņa mīļākais dinozaurs pazaudē asti, Džordžs Lapsas kunga veikalā meklē jaunu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Truša jaunkundzes vilciens ir saplīsis, tāpēc vectēvs aizdod savu vilcieniņu Trūdiju.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Rotaļu grupā ir mājdzīvnieku sacensības, un visi atnesuši savus mājdzīvniekus. Dakteris Kāmis ir vērtētājs, bet ir tik grūti izvēlēties labāko mājdzīvnieku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Fui! Mājā ir zirneklis! Mamma liek tētim no tā atbrīvoties.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene paliek māsīcas Hlojas mājā. Diena bijusi gara, un visi ir miegaini. Bet mazais Aleksandrs neļauj gulēt ar savu raudāšanu!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Bērni bēdājas, jo viņu mīļākā skolotāja Gazeles jaunkundze dodas prom. Bet ballīte ir labas atvadas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai uzdāvina kucēnu, bet kaķītis Lakijs kļūst greizsirdīgs un aizbēg no mājām. Dora dodas viņam atgādināt, ka visi viņu ļoti mīl. Svarīgas čempionāta spēles dienā visi Doras draugi sasirgst ar šķavām. Dora palīdz komandai izveseļoties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kad Barbatēta dzīve parādās Barbamamma un barbabērni, viņa māja paliek par mazu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Truša kundzei piešķirs Karalienes balvu, un Pepa ar draugiem viņu pavadīs uz pili, lai tiktos ar karalieni!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir mīļa, jautra cūciņa, kas dzīvo kopā ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, mammu un tēti. Pepai vislabāk patīk spēles, pārģērbšanās, ekskursijas un dubļu peļķes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pasmaržojot vecmāmiņas lavandas smaržas, Pepa eksperimentē ar puķēm dārzā, lai radītu pati savas īpašās smaržas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Skolas jumts atkal tek, tāpēc bērni rīko tirdziņu, lai savāktu naudu jaunam jumtam.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Zivtiņa Goldija jūtas vientuļi, tāpēc Pepa aizved viņu uz akvāriju.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir skaista diena, bet Pepa, Džordžs, tētis un vectēvs sēž istabā un televizorā skatās sacīkstes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis tiek atstāts, kad visi ar vectēva Truša laivu dodas piknikā. Vai kāds par viņu atcerēsies un pietaupīs gabaliņu kūkas?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir nakts vectēva un vecmāmiņas mājā, un Pepa ar Džordžu vēlu palikuši nomodā, lai palīdzētu medīt gliemjus un gliemežus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā,

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāizbauda labi laikapstākļi!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni ir sajūsmā, kad viņu mīļākā TV zvaigzne Henks Hammers grib redzēt, kā viņi strādā. Kapteinis Turbo ir sagādājis pārsteigumu. Kad saceļas migla, komandai ir jāuzceļ bāka.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Chef are preparing a picnic when theyre attacked by Azrael. They throw the delicious muffins that theyd made for the party at him. But Azrael doesnt like cakes and this annoys Chef. So he decides to make the most delicious cat food for him. Azrael eats the cat food and it makes him as cuddly and cute as a kitten. This gives Gargamel an idea: hes going to give this magic cat food to his mother. She also becomes as gentle as a kitten ... but not for long! // Lily makes waffles that are so delicious that even Dwayne cant get enough of them! To escape from him, Lily and Greedy run away with the waffle truck, trying to lose him. He catches up with them and eats all of Greedys waffles. But thats still not enough, Dwayne wants even more waffles. What he doesnt know is that Voltaire has got his eye on him and knows how to defend Lily.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Life is more fun when youre dancing! Thats what Meteorite is thinking whilst Brainy is trying to get everyone to work so that the village is clean when Papa Smurf returns. When Meteorite finds a night club in the forest, she brings it back to the village with help from Vanity. The discosmurf encounters a huge success - all of the Smurfs and Smurfies are dancing ... but beware, it might be one of Gargamels traps. // Everyone is preparing a dance party and Diaper Daddy is delighted to be going. But his battery is nearly empty so Handy puts him in standby mode to recharge him. When he wakes up, hes devastated to learn that hes missed the party! Annoyed, he heads off into the forest looking for a new family. The first person he bumps into is Dwayne, who adopts him as his new toy, with Rowena looking on with envy. Handy will do everything he can to get his friend back.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.desc: Lils favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the cafe using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of SpongeBobs chaotic driving, Mrs. Puff sends him away to Klopnod on an exchange student driver program. In return, she receives Peppercorn, a sea-mule, who is an excellent driver! Meanwhile, SpongeBob learns that his frenzied driving skills are perfectly suited for the Klopnodian roads (where only farm animals are allowed to drive). However, SpongeBobs newfound Klopnodian driving skills do not translate well upon returning to Bikini Bottom. // Slappy becomes a waiter at the Krusty Krab but scares off customers with his creepy demeanor. He promises Mr. Krabs that his monster friends will be coming to dine that night. Later, the restaurant is packed with monsters and Krabs is thrilled! However, Nosferatu arrives and begs Slappy to return as his servant. Slappy agrees, to Mr. Krabs disappointment - he loved the business the monsters brought in! In the end, however, he realizes that monsters pay in bugs, not cash!

Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe are clicking as a team, celebrating another big save, and impressing Captain Perfect with their work. However, they are unaware that the Masterminds henchman Keifer has implanted a chip in Maxs neck which makes him unwittingly commit crimes in Secret Shores. When President Kickbutt tells Phoebe and Captain Perfect what Max has been doing, she orders them to arrest him. Max escapes, and confronts Keifer about what she has been doing to him. Phoebe and Captain ultimately corner Max and remove the chip from his neck, but Max feels betrayed by his sister. Meanwhile, Chloe helps Jinx navigate a mess when he inadvertently invites both his mom and grandma to the dance as his dates.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.desc: Greg pretends to be injured to avoid having to do a scary trick on the racetrack for his friends. // During a "skill-sharpening" game of hide and seek, Lil Pal hides in Harrys backpack and accidentally gets taken to school.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When the group arrives at a small Earth Kingdom mining town, they see an earthbender, named Haru, who is practicing his ability, but he runs away when Katara tries to confront him about it. They soon learn that the Fire Nation has taken over the town, that earthbending is forbidden and all earthbenders are taken away to an offshore prison. However, when an elderly man is trapped in a collapsed mine, Katara urges Haru to use his powers to save the mans life, but then, the old man reports Haru to the authorities. Katara blames herself for his predicament and she vows to rescue him, but will she succeed?

Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When Aang is assigned to help defend a town from a monster that has been plaguing the town, his lack of ability and knowledge becomes obvious, as he doesnt know what to do. However, when Sokka tries to rush to Aangs rescue during the fight, he himself becomes captured and is taken away by the monster, which turns out to be from the spirit world. Aang promises Katara that hell find Sokka and bring him back, but with Aang even doubting himself, will he be capable of finding where the monster went?

programme.desc: Besters new pet comes between her and her brother. Theres nothing to it, Best must splat the cockroach! // Best and Bester go on an epic quest for a talking whale to prove they answered a board game question correctly.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best ruins Besters painting by accident so in order to avoid hurting her feelings he blames an innocent chicken. // Having lost their soccer ball over the garden fence, the twins have no option but to find a way to get it back.

programme.title: Nella the Princess Knight
programme.desc: Nella the Princess Knight is a British-American animated childrens television series that follows adventurous life of fun-loving and fearless princess Nella who turns into a knight when necessary in order to protect her kingdom. Her main treasure is not her crown but her beloved friends- unicorn Trinket, steed Clod and Sir Garrett. Nella sees that no harm comes to her friends and all other citizens of her kingdom. Together with her friends they have fun, solve mysteries and overcome hardships without which life is impossible even in the happiest kingdom.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Action-packed animation. Four pizza-loving brothers, Raph, Leo, Donnie and Mikey, are mutant turtles who live in the sewers under the streets of New York City. Raph is the oldest of the brothers and also their leader. Leo is the sword-swinging trickster of the team. Donnie is the smartest of the group and Mikey is the youngest brother and also the joker of the bunch. The adventures they go on help them discover their mystic ninja powers and understand the world around them. They learn to work better as a team of heroes. Skills they will need when faced with the enemies who wish to defeat the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
programme.desc: Toast of T.U.F.F:Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster capable of doing much more than making perfect toast. When R.I.T.A. malfunctions and goes out of control, its up to Dudley and Kitty to save the citizens of Petropolis.Share-A-Lair:In an ironic twist, T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share their HQs after destroying each others headquarters. Before completely obliterating each other, T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. agents realize its the Chameleon who has turned them against each other in an effort to further his own ambitions of domination.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.desc: Is love being threatened ? programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Oranžās Indijas Brīvdienas
programme.desc: Grupa "Oranžās Brīvdienas" turpināja savu koncerttūri Indijā. Dodas ar vilcienu uz Mumbaju, lai iepazītu pilsētas kontrastus, ielu dzīvi un unikālos rajonus, tostarp Dharavi graustu rajonu un pasaulē lielāko brīvdabas veļas mazgātuvi. Taču jautrība un piedzīvojumi tiek sajaukti ar negaidītām ziņām - Deli koncerti atcelti. Kā tas mainīs grupas plānus?

programme.title: Rezervēts
programme.desc: Elmārs Tannis. Viņš latviešiem parādīja, kas ir pica. Par to deviņdesmitajos viņam paskaidroja - cik izmaksā noslepkavot cilvēku. Viņš nesaprata, jo krieviski nemācēja. Kļūdījies alkoholismā, restorānos un cilvēkos. Pazaudējis teju visu, bet piedzimis dvēselē no jauna. Tēva bērēs apstulbis, jo pārpildītajā baznīcā nav pazinis teju nevienu. Tāda izskatās mīlestība, ko cilvēks devis, esot uz zemes. Šovmenis, kurš spēj pacelt citus, bet politikas komēdija viņam šķiet traģiska. Viņam ir latviesu asinis, ārzemnieka akcents un pica, kuru ēdis teju katrs latvietis. REZERVĒTS par īstu patriotismu. Elmārs Tannis.

programme.title: Copes Frekvence
programme.desc: Baļotes ezers pazīstams visā Latvijā kā viena no labākajām karpu copes vietām, bet kas notiek ar tā plēsēju resursiem? Regulārie ziņojumi par zandartiem, kas nokož karpinieku ēsmas, liek domāt, ka Baļotē ir izveidojusies plaša un agresīva plēsēju populācija. Ar ezera apsaimniekotāju ielūgumu devāmies šo izpētīt.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadītājs Māris Olte tiksies ar dažādām personībām, lai kliedētu mītus un izzinātu videi draudzīgus meža apsaimniekošanas principus, kā arī aktualizēs dabas vēsturiskā mantojuma varenību.
